message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item. However, I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $14500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $14000 for the product. I hope this meets within your expectations.

I understand you're sticking to your price, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer the product to you for $14200. I think this is as low as I can go without sacrificing the value of the product.
